page.title: 04Village Blacksmith
page.content: In Marden village we still have our own blacksmith, Mr. Don Rogers. His family have had their Smithy on the same site for almost 200 years. Mr. Rogers is the last of the line of smiths in his family and when he closes the doors then it will be the end of a long tradition. The family were renowned farriers and won many competitions in the horse fairs, county shows and other events. Shoeing horses is a minor part of his work now, most of his time is spent in doing specialist welding contracts for the Gas and Water Boards and in agricultural repairs.
